biography: Mikael, a familiar name from Kurk Golf, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While quiet and reserved off the course, Mikael's focus sharpens considerably once he steps onto the green.
Mikael has participated once in the Hector Trophée.
Although Mikael is considered as retired from Hector events, his presence in past tournaments has been noted, and his fans will remember his contribution to the competition.
Mikael will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025.
